name: Sundarbans Mangrove Forest
title: Explore the Enchanting Sundarbans
description: Discover the world's largest mangrove forest, home to the royal Bengal tiger and unique biodiversity.

name: Cox's Bazar
title: Relax on Cox's Bazar Beach
description: Enjoy the longest natural sea beach in the world, known for its golden sands and breathtaking sunsets.

name: Sylhet Tea Gardens
title: Sip Tea Amidst Lush Sylhet Tea Gardens
description: Experience the serenity of tea gardens and rolling hills in Sylhet, a paradise for tea lovers.

name: Srimangal
title: Journey to Srimangal's Green Paradise
description: Explore the 'Land of Two Leaves and a Bud,' famous for its tea estates and biodiversity.

name: Rangamati Hill Tracts
title: Discover the Beauty of Rangamati Hill Tracts
description: Embark on a scenic adventure in the hill tracts, surrounded by lush hills, lakes, and indigenous culture.

name: Sajek Valley
title: Escape to Sajek Valley's Serene Beauty
description: Immerse yourself in the tranquility of Sajek Valley, surrounded by lush green hills, indigenous communities, and breathtaking landscapes.
